name: Jean Kerguen
introduction: Jean Kerguen (born 23 August 1925 and died 16 September 2005) was a French racing driver who is most well known for his achievements in sports car racing. He raced in the 24 Hours of Le Mans ten times between 1957 and 1966. He also entered in the 1958 Moroccan Grand Prix in a privately entered Formula Two Porsche, but did not arrive at the event.
